statements: DELETE FROM HabitatFragmentation WHERE year = 2019 AND land_cover_type = 'Forest';
DELETE FROM HabitatFragmentation WHERE year = 2020 AND land_cover_type = 'Forest'
DELETE FROM HabitatFragmentation WHERE land_cover_type = 'Grassland' AND area_covered_km2 > 100
DELETE FROM habitat_changes WHERE year = 2020 AND change_type = 'Deforestation';
DELETE FROM habitat_fragmentation WHERE time_period <= '2022-01-01' AND area_covered > 1000
DELETE FROM fragmentation_history WHERE fragment_density < 0.5 AND time_period > '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM LandCoverData WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest' AND survey_date < '2021-01-01';
